## About

Junior Software developer with more than three years experience working with multiple languages and frameworks

My name is Fernando Sanchiz, I live in Madrid all my live. I finished my Computer Science degree on 2015 in Universidad Autonoma de Madrid, Spain. I'm an enthusiastic developer, always trying to learn more and more.

I love new challenges and I'm always open to learn new technologies

In my free time when I dont stay doing any type of sport i always create new projects to do like the portfolio projects, there are only for me now to learn new things.
